title: Topic 004 Question 068
body: You have an Azure subscription name Sub1 that contains an Azure Policy definition named Policy1. Policy1 has the following settings:
You need to ensure that resources that are noncompliant with Policy1 are listed in the Azure Security Center dashboard.
options: Change the Category of Policy1 to Security Center.
Add Policy1 to a custom initiative.
Change the Definition location of Policy1 to Sub1.
